ViewObject.Name: VO_RemainingLeaves
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select epelb.TOTAL_LEAVES - count(epcl.leave_date) leaves_remaining from xx_e_portal_consumed_leaves epcl , xx_e_portal_emp_leave_balance epelb ,xx_e_portal_leave_types eplt where epelb.user_id = :user_id and epelb.leave_type_id = :leave_type and epelb.year = to_char(getFiscalYearEndDate(),'rrrr') and epcl.leave_type(+) = epelb.leave_type_id and epcl.user_id(+) = epelb.user_id and epelb.leave_type_id=eplt.leave_type_id and epelb.year = to_char(epcl.leave_date(+),'rrrr')--added on 8/15/2016 group by epelb.TOTAL_LEAVES
